memory: Monday: Team meeting ran over by 30 minutes. Need to finalize Q1 budget report before Friday. IT updated security protocols—change passwords ASAP. Client call with Jacob—delayed till Wednesday.Tuesday: System downtime from 10 AM - 12 PM, slowed down workflow. HR sent updated benefits package—review before next month’s deadline. Sent follow-up emails to vendors, waiting on response.Wednesday: Presentation to leadership went well, but need to tweak a few slides for next week’s review. Client proposal draft ready—send it for legal approval. Need to onboard new hire—schedule one-on-one.Thursday: Finance wants cost-cutting recommendations—brainstorm ideas. Project deadline approaching—check in with Dev team. Caught a mistake in last month’s sales data.Friday: Wrapped up pending reports, but still waiting for final approval. Followed up with vendors—two responded, one still pending. Training session next Monday—prep materials this weekend.
